-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.comment
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    content text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    create_at timestamp with time zone,
    CONSTRAINT comment_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."like"
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    content text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    create_at timestamp with time zone,
    CONSTRAINT like_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.postingan
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    content text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    create_at timestamp with time zone,
    id serial NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT postingan_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."user"
(
    id serial NOT NULL,
    username character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    email character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    password character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    create_at timestamp with time zone,
    CONSTRAINT user_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.comment
    ADD CONSTRAINT id_comment FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public."user" (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS comment_pkey
    ON public.comment(user_id);


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."like"
    ADD CONSTRAINT id_like FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public."user" (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS like_pkey
    ON public."like"(user_id);


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.postingan
    ADD CONSTRAINT id_postingan FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public."user" (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;

END;
